author: lkb57
title: Castle MOC-er likes this (pricey) Nexo Knight set more than expected
review:
When I first saw images of the Nexo Knight line, I was underwhelmed. I'm definitely not a mixer, and the thought of combining castle and sci-fi themes just wasn't that appealing. But the more I looked at these sets, the more I spotted pieces and minifigs (mostly the villains) that as a castle MOC-er I just couldn't pass up. This "Ultimate Beastmaster" is my first purchase in the Nexo Knight line, and much to my surprise, I was very impressed. Not just with the piece select, but with the set as a whole . . . there's something surprisingly retro-Lego about the Nexo Knights that makes them very fun.

Parts

I'll admit, I bought this set for three things: 1) the minifig, 2) the little orange magma monster thingies, and 3) the trans-orange rock piece the Beastmaster stands on. These pieces were all fantastic, as I expected, but I was happy to find that the set comes with a great selection of other pieced as well, including the two short pearl-gold chains, and the trans-purple magic shield thingy, which I'm sure will find it's way into many of my future mocks.

Minifigures

The beastmaster is awesome, and should fit right in with any orc army or fantasy scene you might want to make. His torso is printed front and back with a cool little steel (?) harness, mounted in the front by a badge that resembles the little orange magma monsters he controls. His legs are printed with a continuation of the barbarian-style outfit, and he comes with two facial expressions. Overall he is superb, and I'm definitely planning on acquiring a few more of these.

The build

Quick and simple, but you end up with a cool little stand to place the beastmaster on. I didn't buy this set for the build, so the fact that it's so simple wasn't disappointing to me.

The completed model

The finished product is a really cool, and I can see my son really loving this guy, especially since the shield pieces interact with some kind of app that I have yet to check out.

Overall opinion

Better than expected. I originally though I'd just put the minifig together, then sort out the pieces into my collection for future use. But I ended up having a lot of fun putting this set together. Definitely recommended as a gift for younger children, or as a piece and minifig resource for castle, LOTR and fantasy MOC-ers.

author: Japanbuilder
title: Beast Mastery Plus
review:
He is here at last! The Ultimate Master of Beasts! Does Ultimate Beast Master live up to the hype? Read on.

Box/Instructions

The standard packaging and instructions for these ultimate sets. Still it has something of a splashy flare since it seems he is about ot burst through the cover. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/LTFea1][img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/9/8462/29464492710_31064fc817_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/LTFea1]P9182125[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/MhjXHY][img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/9/8233/29720817966_c98493ce4e.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/MhjXHY]P9182126[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Parts

The parts are interesting the new printed dish with the lightning like swirls is great. Plus those Globlins in orange look great. When you finish you will get a few spare parts including a golden unicorn horn and some other odd pieces. I forgot to include the technic half pin in my shot but you'll have one spare of those as well. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/LTFe4E][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8138/29464492400_4704b64456.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/LTFe4E]P9182130[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Mktewg][img]https://c8.staticflickr.com/9/8173/29756381495_f07e2d1b11.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Mktewg]P9182131[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Minifigures

The figure is the highlight of course and like all the figures in the line this one is fantastic. He has printing front and back and two faces. Though I must say I love his leg prints those globlins in silver look amazing! 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3hTq][img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/8/7565/29129107734_204de0d0b7.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3hTq]P9182128[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3hUs][img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/9/8470/29129107794_22e410415e.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3hUs]P9182129[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

The build

The build was nothing fancy as it did not take long. In fact the stand construction is becoming fairly predictable for these ultimate sets. 

The completed model

The completed model looks great. The 3 Nexo Powers included are fun but I would not rely them for long term play. The figure itself looks great on his stand and his assortment of weapons and spells are also good to have. The hand piece with drill is pretty dangerous looking and he looks every bit the imposing foe. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3gKU][img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/9/8008/29129103934_db9c1df99d.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3gKU]P9182133[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3gXh][img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/9/8228/29129104594_0d8c69a2c3.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Lo3gXh]P9182135[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/139708441@N07/]Macster Tome[/url], on Flickr

Overall opinion

I am liking these ultimate figures. They come with a good assortment of powers for the associated app and a great arsenal that you can share with your other figures. Really a great value. Though I do take some points off as it seems this figure is no different from the one found in set 70314 The Beast Master Chariot.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Weakest Offering of Series 1
review:
Set #70334 Ultimate Beast Master: I’m honestly not as impressed with this offering from Series 1 of the Ultimate Knights, in my opinion this is the weakest offering due to the very lackluster physical Nexo Powers, however there is some good about it if you can get it at clearance prices and here’s the review to explain why.

Packaging

Aside from what I’ve discussed in my previous reviews there’s another aspect about this packaging I should have covered previously. It is designed to hang on pegs, if you’re a fan of MOSC collecting you can collect all of these and hang them up in your collection room.

Another thing to note is the instruction manuals are all kept in pristine condition with no wrinkles or excess damage.

Minifigure

Beast Master: This character reminds me of the Wolf Pack, he’s using the old style hoodie piece and has a very menacing looking print with his torso and legs, together they give off a very dangerous vibe for the character. Nothing appears to be different between him and the one found in the main set he comes with, so this is a cheaper method to acquire the character.

He has two expressions, an angry fierce looking one and an evil smile with a crooked lip curl. He’s also wearing an eye patch, apparently the Globlin he tames are quite dangerous.

The Nexo Powers & Display Stand

I think we’ve covered everything about the display stands included in these sets, aside from one key element, the build. While building these can be repetitive once you’ve bought multiples of them they can be rather simple as well, however they are quick to build and give you more parts than you’d find in older Spinner sets from Ninjago. It’s not like the Speedorz though, it might have been nicer to see something actually created for a decent play function similar to the Speedorz.

Globlin Attack: The first Nexo Power is the best in my opinion, these Lava Monster Ultimate Builds seem to suffer with really poor powers. The Globlin Attack features a unique accessory with a unikitty horn for a drill head and a spinning globlin weapon that can whack the knights in the head and knock them down.

Spirit Vortex: You can keep the globlin weapon on his back here, however I’m not sure if that’s accurate, it probably is though otherwise you’d have very little to play with. Basically you have a printed dish identical to the one with Cosmic Boy. This can be held in Beast Master’s hand, or perhaps attached to the hand weapon, either wait it isn’t much to look at or discuss.

Dynamighty: The final Nexo Power is just a pair of dynamite sticks. Beast Master can hold them to launch and that’s pretty much all the functionality you get out of the physical power, in the App I’d wager it looks more exciting.

Overall opinion

I have to say this particular Ultimate character is just weak as you can get. There is basically not much to do with him, the Nexo Powers in physical form are really lacking and ultimately the biggest draw for the set is the Minifigure, and perhaps some of the parts. Definitely not worth full asking price, I’d recommend this when on clearance for clearance pricing because 13$ at full Canadian retail is not worth it.
